translations: 火箭起飞助推器；火箭助推起飞（rocket-assisted take-off）

sentences.sentence: Mr DE Rato wants to fix this problem in two steps over the next two years.
sentences.translation: de Rato先生希望在接下来的两年内采取两步来解决这个问题。

sentences.sentence: In the speech, Mr. Antonio Rato pointed out the importance of the partnership of airlines and airports.
sentences.translation: 他在发言时指出了航空公司与机场合作伙伴关系的重要性。

sentences.sentence: The application of surface techniques in remanufacturing engineering could improve the utilization rato of old engine parts from 72.3 % to 90 %.
sentences.translation: 表面工程在发动机再制造中的应用，可使发动机的旧件利用率由72.3%提高到90%。
